name: RoBody Snatcher
description:
This is RoBody Snatcher, a twin stick shooter, where you play as a rouge AI, being hunted by the evil Humans. They sent hundreds of robots to kill you! Little did they know, you can hack them, transfer yourself into these killing machines, and use their robots against them. 

(Please use F11 to enable full screen in your browser!)

Moving and Shooting costs Energy, if Energy reaches zero, you die. Controls:

WSAD - Move.
LMB - Shoot Weapon.
RMB - Hack enemy robot.
R - Reset Level.
ESC - Main Menu.



Team:

Ansambel - Game Design / Programming / Level Design
Kurigalzu - Programming
Caffeinatea - VFX / Level Design

Used Assets:

Since we didn't have an artist in the team, we used premade assets.

Robots, Weapons and Projectiles :
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/top-down-assets-futuristic-p...
Walls:
https://trevor-pupkin.itch.io/tech-dungeon-roguelite
Soundtrack and Splash art were AI generated, using midjourney and Soundraw.
